Boma Ozobia OON bụ onye guzobere Sterling Partnership, Nigeria. Ọ bụkwa onye bụbu onye ìsí oche nke Commonwealth Lawyers Association (2011-2013), nwanyị mbụ bụ onye ìsí oche n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke njikọ ahụ.

Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Federal Government Girls' College, Abuloma, Rivers State. Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ gara Mahadum Rivers State ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na LLB weé gaa LLM ya na King's College London.

Boma Ozobia bụ osote onye ísì oche nke Commonwealth Lawyers Association site na 2009 ruo 2011 wee bụrụ onye isi oche site na 2011 ruo 2013.
Tupu mgbe ahụ, ọ bụ onye isi oche, Association of Women Solicitors England and Wales (2005/2006); onye ísì oche، NBA Section on Legal Practice Professional Development Committee
Ọ bụ onye guzobere na onye ìsì mmekọ nke Sterling Partnership
Ọ nọkwa na Board of Trustees nke Royal Commonwealth Society ma nye ya nsọpụrụ mba nke onye ọrụ nke Order of the Niger (OON) na Septemba 2014.
Nwanne nna ya Ambrose Alagoa bụ onye isi ikpe mbụ nke Rivers State
Nwanne nna ya ọzọ, Justice Stanley Alagoa bụkwa onye ọka iwu nke ruru n'ọkwa onye ọka ikpe nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu na Naịjirịa
Nna nna ya bụkwa onye majie.
